languages.text: "Подходите ближе, братья и сестры, ибо сейчас я поведаю вам об истинной вере и смирении перед ликом невзгод".

traits.locale_text: "Подходите ближе, братья и сестры, ибо сейчас я поведаю вам об истинной вере и смирении перед ликом невзгод".

languages.text: "Come closer, brothers and sisters, for I am about to tell you about true faith and humility in the face of adversity."
languages.original_text: "Подходите ближе, братья и сестры, ибо сейчас я поведаю вам об истинной вере и смирении перед ликом невзгод".

traits.locale_text: "Come closer, brothers and sisters, for I am about to tell you about true faith and humility in the face of adversity."
"Come closer, brothers and sisters, for I am about to tell you about true faith and humility in the face of adversity."
"Come closer, brothers and sisters, for I am about to tell you about true faith and humility in the face of adversity."
"Come closer, brothers and sisters, for I am about to tell you about true faith and humility in the face of adversity."

languages.text: “快靠过来吧，兄弟们，姐妹们。我要告诉各位，什么叫做真正的信仰，什么叫做逆境中的谦逊。”
languages.original_text: "Come closer, brothers and sisters, for I am about to tell you about true faith and humility in the face of adversity."

traits.locale_text: “快靠过来吧，兄弟们，姐妹们。我要告诉各位，什么叫做真正的信仰，什么叫做逆境中的谦逊。”

languages.text: «Acercaos, hermanos y hermanas, pues voy a hablaros de la auténtica fe y de la humildad en las situaciones adversas».
languages.original_text: "Come closer, brothers and sisters, for I am about to tell you about true faith and humility in the face of adversity."

traits.locale_text: «Acercaos, hermanos y hermanas, pues voy a hablaros de la auténtica fe y de la humildad en las situaciones adversas».

languages.text: 「もっと近くへ来なさい、同胞たちよ。困難に直面した際に現れる、本物の信仰と謙虚さとは何かを説きましょう」
languages.original_text: "Come closer, brothers and sisters, for I am about to tell you about true faith and humility in the face of adversity."

traits.locale_text: 「もっと近くへ来なさい、同胞たちよ。困難に直面した際に現れる、本物の信仰と謙虚さとは何かを説きましょう」

languages.text: « Approchez, mes frères et mes sœurs, car je vais vous parler des vertus salvatrices de la foi et de l'humilité dans l'adversité. »
languages.original_text: "Come closer, brothers and sisters, for I am about to tell you about true faith and humility in the face of adversity."

traits.locale_text: « Approchez, mes frères et mes sœurs, car je vais vous parler des vertus salvatrices de la foi et de l'humilité dans l'adversité. »

languages.text: "Kommt näher, Brüder und Schwestern, denn ich werde nun vom wahren Glauben und von Demut angesichts von Widrigkeiten berichten."
languages.original_text: "Come closer, brothers and sisters, for I am about to tell you about true faith and humility in the face of adversity."

traits.locale_text: "Kommt näher, Brüder und Schwestern, denn ich werde nun vom wahren Glauben und von Demut angesichts von Widrigkeiten berichten."

languages.text: "Yaklaşın kardeşlerim, size sıkıntı anında imanınızı ve tevazunuzu korumak konusunda anlatacaklarım var."
languages.original_text: "Come closer, brothers and sisters, for I am about to tell you about true faith and humility in the face of adversity."

traits.locale_text: "Yaklaşın kardeşlerim, size sıkıntı anında hakiki iman ve tevazu sahibi olmak hakkında anlatacaklarım var."
